title: PomoFriends Revamp — New Era Release
description:
I originally built PomoFriends in 2020 as my capstone project. Since then, my skills have grown a lot, and the old version no longer represented the kind of product I want to build.

This release marks the beginning of a full revival of the app. I'm no longer abandoning it between updates — I'll be actively improving it, expanding features, and refining the experience until I eventually get bored (hopefully not anytime soon).

features.title: Improved user experience across the entire app

items.text: Real-time rankings updated as users complete pomodoros
Multiple timeframes: weekly, monthly, and all-time statistics
Detailed breakdown of completed pomodoros by day and week
Focus time analytics to track productivity trends
Task completion rates and estimates vs actual time
Visual charts showing your progress over time
Export data for personal record keeping

improvements.title: Multiple stability fixes across chat, tasks, and timer logic

items.text: Task updates sync properly across devices
Timer state persists correctly after refresh

improvements.title: General cleanup of old, broken, or unfinished functionality

items.text: Fixed synchronization issues between group members
Fixed "ghost users" appearing in groups after they leave
Outdated group sessions no longer persist after all users leave
Group member count now updates in real-time
